THE ANIMAL FUND (TAF)
They focus on protecting the ocean and saving dolphins and whales from pollution, overfishing and maltreatment.

Humane Tomorrow
They have give hope to thousands of homeless, abused, and unwanted animals by providing spay/neuter programs, adoption opportunities, and education to the public about animal welfare.

Pet Emergency Fund
It has been offering financial support to pet owners who cannot afford emergency medical treatment for their pets.

The Companion Animal Fund
It was created to subsidize non-elective veterinary care for pets whose owners would otherwise be unable to afford it.

PAW FUND
The idea behind Paw Fund is simple. They help people help their pets. And when everyone can provide basic care to their companion animals, everyoneâ€™s pets benefit.

The Pongo Fund
It is full-time charity focused on fighting animal hunger. Because hungry people have hungry pets.

Pet Adoption Fund
It is a private, an all breed, non-profit, no-kill dog and cat rescue organization and adoption center since 1983. The organization is staffed primarily by volunteers, and exists solely on donations.

Another Day Fund
It was founded by three veterinary professionals who believe that every healthy, treatable animal deserves a chance at another day with their families.

International Fund for Animal Welfare (IFAW)
With projects in more than 40 countries, they rescue individual animals, act locally to prevent animal cruelty, and campaign for the protection of wildlife and habitats.

Anna's Pet Care Fund
It is designed to provide financial assistance and resources to pet owners who are unable to pay for emergency veterinary care for their companion animals. Their goal is to fund the gap in funding that is keeping someone's pet from receiving urgent or emergency care.

Blue Cross Ukraine Pet Welfare Fund
They have a long history of helping animals in times of conflict. Today, they are providing funds to key animal welfare charities in Poland and Romania which we have been working with for a number of years, and which are providing frontline support to Ukrainian people and their pets.
